name: Robot saves tacos
description:
made for the Black and white game jam in like, 1 day and a half.

why did i join the game jame when there was 2 days left?     good question.

use the arrow keys to move and the dumbers 1-4 to use the diferent weapons, use space bar to move the direction arrow 

get has many tacos has you can before you loose

also, no, no music cuz im bad at making music

and i forgot to put that every 2 minutes or so the level changes until it loops arroud (yeah, the theme was looping and i didn't know what to make)
